ApplicationDescription: A program that tracks all the touchpoints for a customer.

Questions.QuestionText: What was the last product purchased by the customer?
Questions.GSQL_Query: SELECT last_product FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = @CustomerID

Questions.QuestionText: What is the total spending of the customer this year?
Questions.GSQL_Query: SELECT SUM(amount) FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = @CustomerID AND YEAR(transaction_date) = @Year
